snippet: To the Editor:    In a Feb. 25 news article, proponents of the California protection of marriage initiative are identified as ''Mormon and Roman Catholic groups,'' and the measure's opponents as ''Protestant and Jewish leaders.''...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: In a Feb. 25 news article, proponents of the California protection of marriage initiative are identified as ''Mormon and Roman Catholic groups,'' and the measure's opponents as ''Protestant and Jewish leaders.''
abstract: Rabbi Avi Shafran letter emphasizes that Jewish religious tradition considers homosexual acts immoral and affirms that only definition of marriage is union of man and woman (S)
